attributes.action: Help the horses and donkeys in the New forest from all the hit and runs.
attributes.background: The horses and donkeys in the New forest are at high risk from irresponsible drivers who are careless around the area. Over 100 animals are killed every year. Including in 2017 a mare and foal were killed from a careless driver! Unfortunately aswell most of the drivers are locals.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Safety on local roads is the responsibility of the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

The UK Government is responsible for motorways and major A roads in England.  If you'd like changes to be made on roads that the Government is responsible for, you could start a new petition asking for a specific change.
